nodes.text: Carl Mosik was a male Human hunter living on the Rryatt Trail on Kashyyyk during the Galactic Civil War in 1.5 ABY. He was an active, undercover member of the Wookiee resistance, a group against the Empire's endorsement of Trandoshan slavery of the Wookiee people of Kashyyyk.

Carl Mosik appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
